content: needles for the ribbing as soon as you start knitting section 1 the cuff using smaller needles and color b co 52 56 60 64 68 stitches and divide onto three dpns as follows size xs needle one 13 sts needle two 26 sts needle three 13 sts size s needle one 14 sts needle two 28 sts needle three 14 sts size m needle one 15 sts needle two 30 sts needle three 15 sts size l needle one 16 sts needle two 32 sts needle three 16 sts size xl needle one 17 sts needle two 34 sts needle three 17 sts place marker only needed if knitting on 9 circulars and join to knit in the round you will slip the marker if using one before beginning each round row 1 * k1 p1 * repeat from * to * to end of row row 2 10 repeat row one you can adjust the height of the cuff to your liking by doing more or fewer row copyright 2020 yarn café creations christy houghton early spring by christy houghton 3 section 2 the pattern section switch to larger needles and color a row 1 k13 14 15 16 17 k2 yo sl1 k1 psso k4 k1 p1 5 6 7 8 9 times k2 yo sl1 k1 psso k4 k to end row 2 k all sts row 3 k13 14 15 16 17 k3 yo sl1 k1 psso k3 p1 k1 5 6 7 8 9 times k3 yo sl1 k1 psso k3 k to end row 4 k all sts row 5 k13 14 15 16 17 k4 yo sl1 k1 psso k2 k1 p1 5 6 7 8 9 times k4 yo sl1 k1 psso k2 k to end row 6 k all sts row 7 k13 14 15 16 17 k5 yo sl1 k1 psso k1 p1 k1 5 6 7 8 9 times k5 yo sl1 k1 psso k1 k to end row 8 k all sts row 9 k13 14 15 16 17 k6 yo sl1 k1 psso k1 p1 5 6 7 8 9 times k6 yo sl1 k1 psso k to end row 10 k all sts row 11 k13 14 15 16 17 c6b yo sl1 k1 psso p1 k1 5 6 7 8 9 times c6b yo sl1 k1 psso k to end row 12 k all sts repeat row 1 12 six six seven seven eight more times afterthought heel setup knit the last 13 14 15 16 17 sts of row 4 on a piece of contrasting colored waste yarn knit the next 13 14 15 16 17 stitches onto this same waste yarn go back and knit these 26 28 30 32 34 stitches that you just put on waste yarn using your main color this is the beginning of your afterthought heel you will go back and finish your heel after you finish knitting the rest of your sock continue onto section three
